sentence: He was also on the losing end of a North Carolina primary in 2020 won by Representative Madison Cawthorn and an Alabama Senate primary in 2017 in which Roy S. Moore defeated Senator Luther Strange.
title: Why Republican Insurgents Are Struggling to Topple G.O.P. Governors

sentence: Madison Cawthorn (@CawthornforNC) April 28, 2022 Cawthorn later tweeted a screenshot of an article from The Epoch Times titled "Rep. Cawthorn Says 'Establishment' Targeting Him With 'Coordinated Drip Campaign.'"
author: Jason Lemon
title: Madison Cawthorn Losing GOP Support Despite Keeping Large Primary Lead
